Parameters: the data types to search for. These can be one of the data types listed in @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#data#DataType_E@, or a custom data type.
setDataTypes(com.google.android.gms.fitn.Description: Sets the desired data types to search for on the BLE scan. We'll only return devices which match this data type. If no data types are set, the request will return all compatible devices.

Parameters: duration of the scan before stopping. Must be a value between 1 and 60 seconds.
setTimeoutSecs(int).Description: Sets how long to wait before automatically stopping the scan, in seconds. If this method isn't called scans will stop after 10 seconds by default.

setBleScanCallback(com.google.android.gm.Description: Sets the callback to be used when devices are found. The callback must be set or @B_com#google#android#gms#fitness#request#StartBleScanRequest#Builder#build_E@ will throw an exception.

Throws: if the builder doesn't have enough data to build a valid request
build().Description: Finishes building and returns the request.

ClassDesc: Builder used to create new DataSourceRequests.
